casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy RICHARDSON. No. 232A95-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Howard A. Kurtz, Raleigh, for Richardson. Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of December 2006 by Defendant to Reverse Death Sentence and Convert to a Life Sentence:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
